\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{import}
\usepackage{hyperref}

\begin{document}

\input{sub_1}

\label{sec11}

\subsubsection{1.1.1}

\subsection{1.2}

\import{subs/}{sub2.tex}

\subsubsection{2.0.1}

\subimport{subs/}{sub3.tex}

\section{4 A long title split
over two lines}

\section*{No \textit{Number} Section}

\section{Section \texorpdfstring{tex}{pdf} Caption}

\begin{figure}
\end{figure}

\begin{figure}
\caption{Figure Caption}
\end{figure}

\begin{table}
\caption{Table Caption}
\end{table}

\begin{frame}
\frametitle{Frame Title 1}
\end{frame}

\begin{frame} {Frame Title 2}
\end{frame}

\begin{frame}
\end{frame}

\end{document}
